=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/01/25 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ridley Scott'], 'Producers': ['Simon Kinberg', 'Ridley Scott', 'Michael Schaeffer', 'Aditya Sood', 'Mark Huffam'], 'Starring': ['Matt Damon', 'Jessica Chastain', 'Kristen Wiig'], 'Studio': ['20th Century Fox']} Review Text: It was a good movie and I found Matt Damon was a perfect actor for the role. I wasn't sure why this was in the comedy/drama category for Golden Globe but I guess I know why now for scattered comedic moments which I thought he struck a pretty good balance of being funny as a person with extreme condition and a possible fate.
Had a good pace and story is strong and convincing (less numbers and scientific theories which are way beyond me) enough to follow without losing focus.
This would be a good choice to watch with your pre-teen and older children. Review Title: Entertaining Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
